meanings.definition: A portable case designed to hold a traveler's clothing and personal belongings.
meanings.sent1: My suitcases were filled with clothes for our vacation.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to lift her heavy suitcases onto the luggage cart.
meanings.sent3: The suitcases decided to take a trip of their own and ended up in the wrong city.
meanings.sent4: His overflowing suitcases were like treasure chests waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The bright red suitcases stood out among the sea of black bags at the airport.

meanings.definition: A piece of luggage typically made of leather or fabric with a handle and used for carrying clothes and other personal items.
meanings.sent1: The old suitcases in the attic were filled with memories from the past.
meanings.sent2: She packed her favorite dress in one of the suitcases for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The suitcases chatted with each other about the places they had visited.
meanings.sent4: His worn-out suitcases told stories of adventures in far-off lands.
meanings.sent5: The suitcases lined up neatly by the door, ready for the journey ahead.
